casebody.data:
Richards, Appellant, v. Board of Education, Akron Public Schools, et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Richards v. Akron Bd. of Edn. (1991), 61 Ohio St.3d 534.]

(No. 91-772 Submitted July 31, 1991 Decided August 21, 1991.) Edward C. Maher, for appellant. Buckingham, Doolittle & Burroughs and Dean E. Westman, for appellee Akron Board of Education. Max Rothal, Director of Law, and Elaine B. Davidson, Assistant Director of Law, for appellee Akron Civil Service Commission.

This cause is reversed and remanded on authority of Nuspl v. Akron (1991), 61 Ohio St.3d 511, 575 N.E.2d 447,

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
